Html:
Not sure if this is possible:

I wrote an app that monitors tasks on several servers and I use impersonation to run the service if the user logged into the app is in a certain security group. What I was wondering is if there is a way to put that users name into the task history instead of the impersonated user's name.

Thanks,
Task history is controlled by the native scheduler. I know no way of manipulating how or what it puts into the event log.
